sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO BASS1600 ( DPOB_CD , MANGE_UNT_BUSIN_NUM , MANGE_BUSIN_CRETN_YR , MANGE_BUSIN_REPBTY_DEPT_CD , MANGE_BUSIN_PERN_CHRG_ID , DTIL_OCCLS_APPTN_UCST_CD , TXTN_FRM_DIV_CD , UNT_DPOB_CD , SOC_INSR_SYM_INTTN_CD , UNT_BUSIN_ACC_CD , MANGE_UNT_BUSIN_BGNN_DT , MANGE_UNT_BUSIN_END_DT , MANGE_UNT_BUSIN_YN , MANGE_UNT_BUSIN_CTNT , BUSN_DTL_TYP_OCCU_CD , BUSN_SMLR_DTL_TYP_OCCU_CD , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #mangeUntBusinNum# , #mangeBusinCretnYr# , #mangeBusinRepbtyDeptCd# , #mangeBusinPernChrgId# , #dtilOcclsApptnUcstCd# , #txtnFrmDivCd# , #untDpobCd# , #socInsrSymInttnCd# , #untBusinAccCd# , #mangeUntBusinBgnnDt# , #mangeUntBusinEndDt# , #mangeUntBusinYn# , #mangeUntBusinCtnt# , #busnDtlTypOccuCd# , #busnSmlrDtlTypOccuCd# , #kybdr# , #inptDt# , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , #revnDt# , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE BASS1600 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , MANGE_UNT_BUSIN_NUM=#mangeUntBusinNum# , MANGE_BUSIN_CRETN_YR=#mangeBusinCretnYr# , MANGE_BUSIN_REPBTY_DEPT_CD=#mangeBusinRepbtyDeptCd# , MANGE_BUSIN_PERN_CHRG_ID=#mangeBusinPernChrgId# , DTIL_OCCLS_APPTN_UCST_CD=#dtilOcclsApptnUcstCd# , TXTN_FRM_DIV_CD=#txtnFrmDivCd# , UNT_DPOB_CD=#untDpobCd# , SOC_INSR_SYM_INTTN_CD=#socInsrSymInttnCd# , UNT_BUSIN_ACC_CD=#untBusinAccCd# , MANGE_UNT_BUSIN_BGNN_DT=#mangeUntBusinBgnnDt# , MANGE_UNT_BUSIN_END_DT=#mangeUntBusinEndDt# , MANGE_UNT_BUSIN_YN=#mangeUntBusinYn# , MANGE_UNT_BUSIN_CTNT=#mangeUntBusinCtnt# , BUSN_DTL_TYP_OCCU_CD=#busnDtlTypOccuCd# , BUSN_SMLR_DTL_TYP_OCCU_CD=#busnSmlrDtlTypOccuCd# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=#inptDt# , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=#revnDt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND MANGE_UNT_BUSIN_NUM=#mangeUntBusinNum#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM BASS1600 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND MANGE_UNT_BUSIN_NUM=#mangeUntBusinNum#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , MANGE_UNT_BUSIN_NUM , MANGE_BUSIN_CRETN_YR , MANGE_BUSIN_REPBTY_DEPT_CD , MANGE_BUSIN_PERN_CHRG_ID , DTIL_OCCLS_APPTN_UCST_CD , TXTN_FRM_DIV_CD , UNT_DPOB_CD , SOC_INSR_SYM_INTTN_CD , UNT_BUSIN_ACC_CD , MANGE_UNT_BUSIN_BGNN_DT , MANGE_UNT_BUSIN_END_DT , MANGE_UNT_BUSIN_YN , MANGE_UNT_BUSIN_CTNT , BUSN_DTL_TYP_OCCU_CD , BUSN_SMLR_DTL_TYP_OCCU_CD , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM BASS1600 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND MANGE_UNT_BUSIN_NUM=#mangeUntBusinNum#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , MANGE_UNT_BUSIN_NUM , MANGE_BUSIN_CRETN_YR , MANGE_BUSIN_REPBTY_DEPT_CD , MANGE_BUSIN_PERN_CHRG_ID , DTIL_OCCLS_APPTN_UCST_CD , TXTN_FRM_DIV_CD , UNT_DPOB_CD , SOC_INSR_SYM_INTTN_CD , UNT_BUSIN_ACC_CD , MANGE_UNT_BUSIN_BGNN_DT , MANGE_UNT_BUSIN_END_DT , MANGE_UNT_BUSIN_YN , MANGE_UNT_BUSIN_CTNT , BUSN_DTL_TYP_OCCU_CD , BUSN_SMLR_DTL_TYP_OCCU_CD , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM BASS1600 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
MANGE_UNT_BUSIN_NUM LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , MANGE_UNT_BUSIN_NUM DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM BASS1600 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
MANGE_UNT_BUSIN_NUM LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
